com.ll.smsbeans
Class ConnectionBean.SendPacket

java.lang.Object
  com.ll.smsbeans.ConnectionBean.SendPacket
Enclosing class:
ConnectionBean
public class ConnectionBean.SendPacket
extends java.lang.Object

SendPacket作为在发送过程中记录所发送的包发送时间和重复发送的次数的类， 用于判断包是否发送成功。

Author:
listlike <listlike@hotmail.com>
